Title: An American Tail
Genre: Animation, Adventure, Comedy, Drama, Family, Musical
Writer: Judy Freudberg (screenplay), Tony Geiss (screenplay), David Kirschner (story), Judy Freudberg (story), Tony Geiss (story)
Actors: Erica Yohn, Nehemiah Persoff, Amy Green, Phillip Glasser
Plot: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 5 nominations.
